sanskrit_verse:
जनन्यां संस्थितायां तु समं सर्वे सहोदराः ।
भजेरन् मातृकं रिक्थं भगिन्यश्च सनाभयः ॥ ९.१९२॥
transliteration:
jananyāṃ saṃsthitāyāṃ tu samaṃ sarve sahodarāḥ |
bhajeran mātṛkaṃ rikthaṃ bhaginyaśca sanābhayaḥ || 9.192||

Capacity-based responsibility extends equally among all progeny when maternal foundation remains intact.
Restoration logic prioritizes familial unity and economic equity rooted in maternal coherence.
Consciousness alignment requires recognition of shared origin and mutual stewardship within the family matrix.
